title: Collaborative Surgery Simulator
description: It is a prototype designed to create a multi-user environment for simulating lipoma extraction surgery. This simulator allows multiple users to engage in a realistic surgical experience, each assuming specific roles such as surgeon, assistant, or resident, and communicating through an integrated voice chat feature. This simulator has garnered academic recognition, including a publication in an IEEE article.
bulletItems: Online Multiplayer System: Users can select and perform different roles within the surgical team, enhancing collaborative learning and practice with real-time voice communication.

Real-Time 3D Mesh Modification: Simulates the surgical cutting process in real time, allowing users to make precise cuts on the 3D model of the skin covering the lipoma, closely mimicking the actual surgical procedure.
Avatar Animations with hand controls: Includes a procedural rig that enables full hand movement and interaction with objects, providing a realistic and interactive experience.
Object Transfer Between Users: Facilitates seamless transfer of instruments and objects between users, mirroring the teamwork required in an actual operating room.

title: UNO 3D
description: It is a sophisticated adaptation of the classic card game UNO, presented in an immersive three-dimensional environment. This version retains the beloved gameplay while introducing a minimalist design for the cards, creating an elegant and engaging visual experience.
bulletItems: Multiplayer System: Accommodates up to six players, making it ideal for both casual and competitive play.
3D Animations: Features dynamic 3D animations for special cards, enhancing the interactive experience.
Complete Game Logic: Fully implements the traditional rules and mechanics of UNO, ensuring a seamless and authentic gameplay experience.

title: Breakout
description: My version of the classic "Breakout" game features an attractive sci-fi style and fun, challenging levels.
bulletItems: Power-Ups: Elevate your gaming experience with power-ups that augment your paddle's size and equip you with lasers, allowing for strategic block destruction.
Immerse yourself in the sci-fi atmosphere with captivating music and sound effects.

title: Pong
description: My version of the classic "Pong" game features an engaging sci-fi aesthetic and customizable gameplay, enhancing replayability and providing fresh challenges with each playthrough.
bulletItems: Local Multiplayer: Supports up to 4 players, with 2 players using the keyboard and 2 using gamepads.
Flexible Player Options: Players can choose between competing against human opponents or AI, allowing for a versatile gaming experience.

Customizable Gameplay: Players can enable or disable obstacles and power-ups to add complexity. Power-ups can freeze opponents or increase their speed, enhancing the challenge and strategic depth of the game.

title: Tira Island
description: This project is a 2D action/adventure platformer demo developed collaboratively with two colleagues. I was responsible for all programming aspects related to gameplay, enemies, and player controls.
bulletItems: Modular Weapon System: Implemented a modular weapon system utilizing object pooling to optimize performance and adhere to good coding practices.
Development Tools: Created various tools to simplify the addition of new enemy types and features, enhancing the overall gameplay experience.

title: Jump Command
description: Inspired by Google's Dinosaur Game, this game challenges players to dodge obstacles and survive for as long as possible. The game offers a unique twist with the option to control the character using voice commands or the traditional keyboard, making it accessible and engaging for a wide range of players.
bulletItems: Voice Command Controls: Play using voice commands in either English or Spanish, or opt for classic keyboard controls for a versatile gaming experience.
Increasing Difficulty: The game becomes progressively more challenging over time, ensuring that players remain engaged and tested.
Multiplatform Compatibility: Enjoy the game on both desktop and web browsers, providing flexibility and convenience for players.

title: Cookie Mania
description: single-player game designed to test your speed and precision. The goal is simple: collect as many cookies as you can within a limited time while navigating a dynamically changing terrain. Be cautious, as falling off the map will end your run!
bulletItems: Procedural Map Generation: Every playthrough offers a unique challenge with maps generated on the fly, ensuring endless replayability and a fresh experience each time you play.
Stream Writing for Score Storage: Your high scores are efficiently saved using advanced stream writing techniques, allowing you to track and compare your progress seamlessly.
